award_title: Collaborative Research: Development of a Multiscale Framework to Understand Saturation and Coupled Ice/Salt Crystallization Phenomena in Low/Zero Clinker Cementitious Materials
subject: Concrete durability + reproducible computational workflows
body:
Hi Professor Suraneni,

I came across your NSF project on making concrete more durable in freeze-thaw conditions. What stood out is how you're combining experimental work with molecular dynamics simulationsâ€”that's the kind of multiscale modeling work that's ripe for sharing.

I'm building Ouro, a platform to publish computational workflows as APIs so other researchers can directly use your methods instead of just reading about them in papers. Wondering if a quick 15-minute call could be useful?

Best,
